content: this legal case took place in the municipal court of split and it was the first instance of the case the case is about a cost procedure involving a coownership property in croatia the property consisted of a house yard groundfloor apartment and business building one party proposed to dissolve the coownership and sell the property through a public auction the court examined documents and expert opinions to determine the value of the property it was decided that the property would be sold at auction and the proceeds would be divided among the coowners according to their shares specified in the land registry
